title: Airtable & Notion 4.0
description: Revamped the booking system for 200+ Music Education students on the Purdue Fort Wayne Sweetwater Music Center website, resolving 10+ critical bugs and improving scheduling efficiency.

title: DonsEats: On-Campus Food Ordering System
description: Created a web app enabling students to order food from on-campus restaurants, with features like real-time tracking and future pickup scheduling, improving both student dining experience and operational efficiency for restaurants.

title: Chest X-ray Disease Classification Using Convolutional Neural Networks
description: Developed a deep learning pipeline to classify 100,000+ chest X-rays into 14 disease categories using VGG16, ResNet50, and MobileNetV2, achieving up to 92% accuracy and improving model performance with data aug- mentation.

title: PFW Question Answering System
description: Deployed and fine-tuned a question-answering system for Purdue Fort Wayneâ€™s website, leveraging NLP models (BERT, RoBERTa, XLNet) to handle 500+ campus-related queries with high accuracy.

title: QuestSpot: Docode the clues, decode the world
description: This project was designed to advance cross-platform development skills by building a multi-language Flutter-Firebase scavenger hunt app. Integrated Gemini AI to generate location-based clues, offering features like difficulty levels, game-sharing, bonus point analysis, heatmaps, and dark/light themes for Android and iOS.
